ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure
Class PhotoTile

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.Tile
      ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.PhotoTile

public class PhotoTile
extends Tile

A photo Tile for use in stories. PhotoTile is a concrete implementation of the abstract class Tile. PhotoTile is a member of this application's model, it is included in the JSON when the story is serialized and stored via the use of the handlers. A PhotoTile will contain an image to be displayed in the story. TODO This class is only partially implemented. The "Object photo" member is a place holder. TODO This class needs to be designed with serialization in mind, dropping unnecessary duplication of members.
